鷞字的基本解释

鷞
shuāng
古同“鸘”。

鷞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shuāng］
［《廣韻》色莊切，平陽，生。］
见“鷫鷞”。
[②]［shuǎng］
［《廣韻》踈兩切，上養，生。］
见“鷞2鳩”。

鷞字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鷞； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1499第24
【唐韻】所莊切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】師莊切，?音霜。【說文】鷫鷞，西方神鳥。【正字通】長頸綠色似鴈，皮可爲裘。【揚雄·蜀都賦】䨥鷤鷫鷞。【史記·司馬相如傳】家貧，以鷫鷞裘貰酒。一作肅爽。馬名。【左傳·定三年】唐成公有兩肅爽馬。【疏】肅爽，其羽如練，高首而修頸，馬似之。俗作鸘。又【廣韻】疎兩切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】所兩切，?音縔。【廣韻】鷞鳩，鷹也。亦作爽。【左傳·昭二十年】晏子曰：爽鳩氏始居此地。【註】爽鳩氏，少皡司?。

鷞字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鷞字的起名意思

古同“鸘”。

Basic explanation of words
鷞
shuāng
The ancient same "emu".
鷞
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [shuāng]
["Guangyun" Se Zhuangqie, Pingyang, raw. ]
See "鹔鷞".
[②]［shuǎng］
["Guang Yun" cut in two ways, nourishing and healthy. ]
See "Yi 2 Dove".
鷞
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鷞; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 1499 Page 24
[Tang Yun] So Zhuang Qi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Shi Zhuang Qi,? Yin Shuang. [Said the text] 鹔鷞, the Western sacred bird. [Zhengzitong] The long neck is green like a goose, and the skin can be fur. 【Yang Xiong·Fu of Shu Capital】Senior fate. [Historical Records · Sima Xiangru Biography] Poor family, with wine. It's so cool. Horse name. [Zuo Zhuan·Ding three years] Tang Chenggong has two cool horses. 【Sparse】It is so cool, its feathers are like training, its head is tall and its neck is repaired, its horse is like it. Popular as an emperor. Also [Guangyun] Nine two cuts [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] two cuts,? Yin 縔. [Guangyun] Dove, eagle. Also cool. [Zuo Zhuan·20th Year of Zhao] Yan Zi said: The Shuangjiu family first lived here. [Note] Shuangjiu's family, Shaojiaosi?.
